div.p: RUGEN an iſland in the Baltic Sea, on the coaſt ,of Pomerania, over againſt Stralſund, about 23 miles in length and 15 in breadth, with the title of a principality. It is ſtrong both by art and nature, abounds in corn and cattle, and belongs to Sweden. The chief town is Bergen. E. Long. 14. 30. N. Lat. 54. 32.
